Jasprit Bumrah’s wife Sanjana Ganesan slams trolls in a long note after her recent viral comment: ‘Why am I expected to keep quiet and ignore…?’ - Times of India
articles.description: TV presenter and Indian cricketer Jasprit Bumrah’s wife Sanjana Ganesan recently took to her Instagram Stories to pen a long note addressing trolls. Narrating how a troller that she hit back on recently deleted and reported her comment, Sanjana in her note sa…
articles.content:
